column4: I have a somewhat old laptop that I am wanting to turn into one of those moving photo picture frames.  Does anyone know of an image viewer that can achieve the affects those picture frames do and automatedly rotate through albums?
thanks and sorry! for not looking more carefully first. :(
there's also about 20 other different ones here http://ask.slashdot.org/article.pl?sid=04/05/24/2114206
